name: market for heat distribution equipment, hydronic radiant floor heating, 150m2 | heat distribution equipment, hydronic radiant floor heating, 150m2 | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/1696/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'heat distribution equipment, hydronic radiant floor heating, 150m2', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;This is an immobile infrastructure, representing the construction of a heat distribution equipment, hydronic radiant floor heating, 150m2. It is a floor heating system at low temperature with 40°C of inlet temperature and 30-35°C of return temperature for a one family house. It has an energy reference area amounts to 165 m2 and a heated gross net area of 150 m2 with a lifetime assumed to be 20 years. Its production represents all materials necessary to construct it and decommission.

This activity starts with the built infrastructure ready to use.

This activity ends with the infrastructure made accessible to the users. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
